levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(五)

examples.english: It's hard to understand this difficult science concept.
examples.chinese: 這個困難的科學概念很難了解。

examples.english: I understand why you feel so sad.
examples.chinese: 我了解你為什麼這麼難過。

examples.english: Now I understand the importance of practice.
examples.chinese: 我現在了解練習的重要性了。

examples.english: We will invite all our friends to the Christmas party next week.
examples.chinese: 我們下週將會邀請所有朋友來參加聖誕派對。

examples.english: My mom asked me to invite my classmates over for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽叫我邀請同學來家裡吃晚餐。

examples.english: The teacher invited students to share their opinions on the topic.
examples.chinese: 老師邀請學生們分享他們對這個主題的看法。

examples.english: My family plans to visit my uncle in Taipei next month.
examples.chinese: 我的家人下個月計畫去台北拜訪我叔叔。

examples.english: They often visit the national park to enjoy nature.
examples.chinese: 他們經常參觀國家公園以享受大自然。

examples.english: You should visit the dentist for a regular check-up.
examples.chinese: 你應該去牙醫那裡做個例行檢查。

examples.english: We must prepare for the big English test next week.
examples.chinese: 我們必須為下週的英文大考做準備。

examples.english: Mom always prepares delicious dinner for our family.
examples.chinese: 媽媽總是為我們家人準備美味的晚餐。

examples.english: Students should prepare their presentations carefully before class.
examples.chinese: 學生們應該在課前仔細準備他們的報告。

examples.english: My grandmother bought a new mop for cleaning the living room.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶買了一把新拖把來清潔客廳。

examples.english: Don't forget to mop the floor after dinner tonight.
examples.chinese: 今晚晚餐後別忘了拖地。

examples.english: The janitor quickly had to mop up the water on the hallway floor.
examples.chinese: 工友很快就得把走廊上的水拖乾淨。

examples.english: Please remember to send this postcard to your friend.
examples.chinese: 請記得把這張明信片寄給你的朋友。

examples.english: I will send you an email with all the details tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我明天會寄一封電子郵件給你，裡面有所有細節。

examples.english: My parents sent me a big gift for my birthday last week.
examples.chinese: 我父母上週寄給我一個大禮物，當作我的生日禮物。

examples.english: When I was young, I could run very fast.
examples.chinese: 我小時候跑得很快。

examples.english: We could go to the night market tonight for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我們今晚可以去夜市吃晚餐。

examples.english: Could you please help me carry these heavy books?
examples.chinese: 你能幫我搬這些很重的書嗎？

examples.english: After one hour, the teacher is still explaining the difficult math problem.
examples.chinese: 一個小時後，老師仍然在解釋那道困難的數學題。

examples.english: Although it's late, my little sister is still reading her favorite book.
examples.chinese: 雖然已經很晚了，我的小妹妹仍然在讀她最喜歡的書。

examples.english: He studied hard for the test, but he still felt a little worried.
examples.chinese: 他為考試努力學習，但他仍然覺得有點擔心。

examples.english: We hope to visit the night market again soon.
examples.chinese: 我們希望能很快再逛夜市。

examples.english: Please finish your homework soon so we can play.
examples.chinese: 請你趕快把作業寫完，我們就能去玩了。

examples.english: The heavy rain will stop soon, don't worry.
examples.chinese: 大雨很快就會停了，別擔心。

examples.english: My teacher always encourages me to try my best.
examples.chinese: 我的老師總是鼓勵我盡力而為。

examples.english: Could you please wait for me by the gate after school?
examples.chinese: 放學後你可以在校門口等我嗎？

examples.english: It's hard for me to understand this math problem.
examples.chinese: 這個數學問題對我來說很難理解。

examples.english: My friend called him to ask about the homework.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友打電話給他，問作業的事情。

examples.english: We should cheer him up after he lost the game.
examples.chinese: 他比賽輸了之後，我們應該要鼓勵他。

examples.english: My mom asked him to help me with my English project.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽請他幫我做英文專案。

examples.english: My brother often helps me with my homework after school.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥放學後常常幫我寫作業。

examples.english: It often gets very hot in Taiwan during the summer.
examples.chinese: 臺灣夏天常常變得非常熱。

examples.english: My family and I often visit the night market on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我和我的家人週末常常去夜市。

examples.english: Our coach encouraged us to try our best in the game.
examples.chinese: 我們的教練鼓勵我們在比賽中盡力而為。

examples.english: Please wait for us at the bus stop after school.
examples.chinese: 請放學後在公車站等我們。

examples.english: Let us know if you need help with your homework.
examples.chinese: 如果你需要家庭作業的幫助，請告訴我們。

examples.english: The teacher helped them understand the difficult math problem.
examples.chinese: 老師幫助他們理解那個困難的數學問題。

examples.english: Don't worry about them; they will be fine on their own.
examples.chinese: 別擔心他們；他們會自己好好的。

examples.english: If you don't need these old magazines, throw them away.
examples.chinese: 如果你不需要這些舊雜誌了，把它們丟掉吧。

examples.english: That red bicycle is mine.
examples.chinese: 那輛紅色的腳踏車是我的。

examples.english: This cat is one of mine; I have many pets.
examples.chinese: 這隻貓是我的其中一隻；我有很多寵物。

examples.english: Your sandwich looks yummy, but mine is healthier.
examples.chinese: 你的三明治看起來很好吃，但我的比較健康。

examples.english: I found this phone on the desk; I think it might be yours.
examples.chinese: 我在桌上找到這支手機；我想它可能是你的。

examples.english: This cute puppy needs a new home; if you like it, it can be yours.
examples.chinese: 這隻可愛的狗狗需要一個新家；如果你喜歡，牠就可以是你的了。

examples.english: Don't forget to take your belongings; make sure all yours are packed.
examples.chinese: 別忘了帶走你的個人物品；確保你所有的東西都打包好了。

examples.english: That backpack is hers, not mine.
examples.chinese: 那個背包是她的，不是我的。

examples.english: My favorite color is blue, but hers is green.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的顏色是藍色，但她的是綠色。

examples.english: He admired her courage, and I admired hers too.
examples.chinese: 他欣賞她的勇氣，我也欣賞她的。

examples.english: My birthday is next Friday, so I'm excited for a big party.我的生日在下禮拜五，所以我很期待一場盛大的派對。
We surprised him with a birthday cake and sang 'Happy Birthday'.我們用生日蛋糕給他驚喜，並唱了「生日快樂」。
Her birthday wish was to travel abroad for the first time.她的生日願望是第一次出國旅行。
This big dog is ours, so please don't be afraid.
examples.chinese: 這隻大狗是我們的，所以請不要害怕。

examples.english: Their house is much older than ours, but we love it.
examples.chinese: 他們的房子比我們的舊很多，但我們很喜歡它。

examples.english: They brought their own lunch, and we also brought ours.
examples.chinese: 他們帶了他們自己的午餐，我們也帶了我們的。

examples.english: Our group finished the project, and theirs will finish next week.
examples.chinese: 我們的組完成了專案，他們的下週才會完成。

examples.english: These new uniforms are definitely theirs; they left them here.
examples.chinese: 這些新制服肯定是他們的；他們把制服忘在這裡了。

examples.english: We have our own ideas, and they also have theirs.
examples.chinese: 我們有自己的想法，他們也有他們的。

examples.english: He always wears a baseball cap in summer.
examples.chinese: 他夏天總是戴一頂棒球帽。

examples.english: She wears a chef's cap while cooking in the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 她在廚房煮飯時會戴廚師帽。

examples.english: Don't forget to wear your swimming cap at the pool.
examples.chinese: 在游泳池裡別忘了戴泳帽。

examples.english: She often wears her comfortable jeans to school.
examples.chinese: 她經常穿她舒適的牛仔褲去上學。

examples.english: My brother just bought a pair of stylish dark jeans.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥剛買了一條時尚的深色牛仔褲。

examples.english: You can wear jeans for a casual look on weekends.
examples.chinese: 週末時你可以穿牛仔褲營造休閒風格。

examples.english: You should wear a warm sweater; it's quite cold today.
examples.chinese: 你應該穿一件保暖的毛衣；今天相當冷。

examples.english: My grandma knitted a beautiful sweater for my birthday last week.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶上週為我的生日織了一件漂亮的毛衣。

examples.english: Oh no, I spilled juice on my favorite sweater today!
examples.chinese: 噢不，我今天把果汁灑在我最喜歡的毛衣上了！

examples.english: The new student is an American who moved from New York last month.
examples.chinese: 新來的學生是個美國人，他上個月從紐約搬來的。

examples.english: Many people around the world enjoy American music and movies.
examples.chinese: 全世界許多人都喜歡美國音樂和電影。

examples.english: Learning English from an American teacher helps improve our speaking.
examples.chinese: 向美國老師學習英文有助於我們提升口說能力。

examples.english: The friendly waiter quickly took our order.
examples.chinese: 友善的服務生很快地接了我們的點餐。

examples.english: Could you ask the waiter for more water, please?
examples.chinese: 你可以請服務生多給我們一些水嗎？

examples.english: The new waiter was a bit nervous at first.
examples.chinese: 新來的服務生剛開始有點緊張。

examples.english: The friendly clerk helped me find the perfect gift.
examples.chinese: 友善的店員幫我找到了最完美的禮物。

examples.english: The hotel clerk checked us in and gave us a room key.
examples.chinese: 飯店店員幫我們辦理了入住手續，並給了我們房間鑰匙。

examples.english: Ask the clerk at the counter if they have it in stock.
examples.chinese: 問問櫃檯的店員，他們是否有貨。

examples.english: He wants a job that allows him to travel often.
examples.chinese: 他想要一份能讓他經常旅行的工作。

examples.english: It's a big job to organize all these books correctly.
examples.chinese: 正確整理所有這些書是一項大工程。

examples.english: It's a teacher's job to help students learn effectively.
examples.chinese: 幫助學生有效學習是老師的工作。

examples.english: The clouds turned a dark gray just before the storm.
examples.chinese: 烏雲在暴風雨來臨前變得一片深灰色。

examples.english: My dad started to have some gray hairs at his temples.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸的太陽穴開始出現一些灰白的頭髮。

examples.english: Whether to tell a small lie can be a moral gray area.
examples.chinese: 說一個小謊是否正確可能是一個道德上的灰色地帶。

examples.english: The art teacher asked us to paint a purple mountain in our landscape.美麗
examples.chinese: 美術老師要求我們在風景畫中畫一座紫色的山。

examples.english: The sunset sky turned a soft purple as the day ended.美麗
examples.chinese: 隨著一天結束，夕陽的天空變成柔和的紫色。

examples.english: If you mix red and blue paint, you will get purple.美麗
examples.chinese: 如果你混合紅色和藍色顏料，你就會得到紫色。

examples.english: We took an airplane to Japan for our summer vacation.
examples.chinese: 我們搭飛機去日本度暑假。

examples.english: From the window, I could see an airplane flying above the clouds.
examples.chinese: 從窗戶看出去，我看到一架飛機在雲層上飛行。

examples.english: Modern airplanes can fly very fast and carry many passengers.
examples.chinese: 現代的飛機可以飛得很快，並載運許多乘客。

examples.english: In Taiwan, many students ride motorcycles to school every day.
examples.chinese: 許多台灣學生每天騎機車上學。

examples.english: Last summer, my uncle rode his motorcycle around the whole island.
examples.chinese: 去年夏天，我叔叔騎機車環島了。

examples.english: Always wear a helmet when you ride a motorcycle for safety.
examples.chinese: 為了安全，騎機車時請務必戴安全帽。

examples.english: There are many cars driving on this busy street.
examples.chinese: 這條繁忙的街道上有很多汽車行駛。

examples.english: Kids often play games on our quiet street.
examples.chinese: 孩子們經常在我們安靜的街道上玩遊戲。

examples.english: The word on the street is a new cafe is opening.
examples.chinese: 街頭巷尾都在傳聞一家新的咖啡館即將開幕。

examples.english: Our small town has a beautiful park and a lively market.
examples.chinese: 我們的小城鎮有一個漂亮的公園和一個熱鬧的市場。

examples.english: We often go into town on weekends to watch movies.
examples.chinese: 我們週末常常進城去看電影。

examples.english: The whole town celebrated when our school team won the championship.
examples.chinese: 當我們學校的隊伍贏得冠軍時，全鎮的人都慶祝了。

examples.english: We walked three blocks to get to the park.
examples.chinese: 我們走了三個街區才到公園。

examples.english: The entire block was decorated with colorful lights.
examples.chinese: 整個街區都裝飾著五顏六色的燈。

examples.english: Do you live on this block or the next one?
examples.chinese: 你住這個街區還是下一個？

examples.english: Living in a big city offers many opportunities for young people.
examples.chinese: 住在一個大城市為年輕人提供許多機會。

examples.english: We planned to visit a new city for our summer vacation this year.
examples.chinese: 我們計劃今年暑假去一個新的城市度假。

examples.english: The city never sleeps; there is always something happening, even at night.
examples.chinese: 這個城市從不入眠；總是有事情發生，即使在晚上。

examples.english: There is a small desk in the corner of my room.
examples.chinese: 我的房間角落裡有一張小書桌。

examples.english: The little cat quickly turned the corner and ran away.
examples.chinese: 那隻小貓快速地轉過轉角跑走了。

examples.english: The coffee shop is just around the corner.
examples.chinese: 咖啡店就在轉角處。

examples.english: My family loves to buy clothes and shoes at that department store.
examples.chinese: 我的家人喜歡在那間百貨公司買衣服和鞋子。

examples.english: Let's meet for lunch at the department store's food court today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天中午在百貨公司的美食街見面吧。

examples.english: You can find almost anything you need in this department store.
examples.chinese: 你可以在這間百貨公司找到你幾乎所有需要的東西。

examples.english: The beautiful theater often hosts famous opera performances.
examples.chinese: 這座美麗的劇院經常舉辦著名的歌劇表演。

examples.english: He loves the magic of live theater and acting on stage.
examples.chinese: 他熱愛現場戲劇的魔力，也喜歡在舞台上表演。

examples.english: Let's go to the theater to see the new superhero film.
examples.chinese: 我們去看新上映的超級英雄電影吧！

examples.english: Let's go to the movie theater to watch the new superhero film.
examples.chinese: 我們去電影院看那部新的超級英雄電影吧。

examples.english: The new movie theater has comfortable seats and a huge screen.
examples.chinese: 這家新的電影院有舒適的座位和一個巨大的螢幕。

examples.english: Watching a movie in a dark movie theater is a special experience.
examples.chinese: 在漆黑的電影院裡看電影是一種特別的體驗。

examples.english: My sister is crazy about K-pop music and watches all their videos.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹對K-pop音樂很著迷，他們的影片她都會看。

examples.english: Many students are crazy about the new mobile game right now.
examples.chinese: 許多學生現在對這款新的手機遊戲很著迷。

examples.english: My little brother is crazy about his favorite superhero action figures.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟對他最喜歡的超級英雄公仔很著迷。

examples.english: There's a popular bubble tea shop on this street.
examples.chinese: 這條街上有一間很受歡迎的珍珠奶茶店。

examples.english: My family loves to shop for gifts during the holidays.
examples.chinese: 我家人喜歡在節慶期間購物買禮物。

examples.english: You can find many unique items at that small shop.
examples.chinese: 你可以在那間小商店找到很多獨特的商品。

examples.english: My sister ordered a special bouquet from the flower shop for her friend's birthday.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐為了她朋友的生日，從花店訂了一束特別的花束。

examples.english: The small flower shop on the corner always smells incredibly good.
examples.chinese: 街角那間小花店總是香氣撲鼻。

examples.english: Visiting a flower shop is a relaxing way to enjoy nature's beauty.
examples.chinese: 逛花店是一種能享受大自然之美，又能讓人放鬆的方式。

examples.english: Is the train station far from the school?
examples.chinese: 火車站離學校很遠嗎？

examples.english: Many people wait at the bus station every morning.
examples.chinese: 每天早上，很多人在公車站等車。

examples.english: The new train station is very clean and bright.
examples.chinese: 新的火車站非常乾淨明亮。

examples.english: I need to go to the police station to report my lost wallet.
examples.chinese: 我需要去警察局報失我的錢包。

examples.english: They visited the police station to learn about safety rules.
examples.chinese: 他們去警察局參觀，學習安全規則。

examples.english: The police station helps keep our community safe.
examples.chinese: 警察局幫助維持我們社區的安全。

examples.english: Building a new railway across the island takes many years.
examples.chinese: 建造一條橫跨島嶼的新鐵路需要很多年。

examples.english: Taiwan High Speed Railway offers convenient and fast travel.
examples.chinese: 台灣高鐵提供方便又快速的旅行。

examples.english: The railway connects many towns, helping people travel easily.
examples.chinese: 這條鐵路連接許多城鎮，幫助人們輕鬆旅行。

examples.english: Please turn left at the next intersection.
examples.chinese: 請在下一個路口向左轉。

examples.english: The leaves turn yellow and red in autumn.
examples.chinese: 秋天時，樹葉會變黃變紅。

examples.english: It's your turn to play the game now.
examples.chinese: 現在輪到你玩這個遊戲了。

examples.english: You will find the library on your left.
examples.chinese: 你會在你的左手邊找到圖書館。

examples.english: Turn left at the next traffic light.
examples.chinese: 在下一個紅綠燈路口向左轉。

examples.english: Our classroom is the second door on the left.
examples.chinese: 我們的教室是左邊的第二扇門。

examples.english: Go straight for two blocks, then turn right.
examples.chinese: 往前直走兩個街區，然後向右轉。

examples.english: You will find the museum on your right.
examples.chinese: 你會在你的右方找到博物館。

examples.english: Remember to keep to the right when riding your bicycle.
examples.chinese: 騎腳踏車時，記得要靠右行駛。

examples.english: Don't forget to put a stamp on the letter before mailing it.
examples.chinese: 寄信前別忘了在信上貼郵票。

examples.english: My grandpa enjoys collecting stamps from all over the world.
examples.chinese: 我爺爺喜歡收集來自世界各地的郵票。

examples.english: This special stamp has a picture of Taiwan's famous landmark.
examples.chinese: 這張特別的郵票上面有台灣著名地標的圖片。

examples.english: We received exciting news about our school trip yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天收到了關於校外教學的振奮消息。

examples.english: Many people like to watch the evening news after dinner.
examples.chinese: 很多人喜歡在晚餐後收看晚間新聞。

examples.english: The sudden news of the concert's cancellation surprised everyone.
examples.chinese: 演唱會突然取消的消息讓所有人都很驚訝。

examples.english: Please grab a warm blanket from the sofa.
examples.chinese: 請從沙發上拿一條溫暖的毯子。

examples.english: The ground was covered by a white blanket of snow.
examples.chinese: 地面被一層潔白的雪毯覆蓋著。

examples.english: Heavy snow blanketed the town last winter.
examples.chinese: 去年冬天，大雪覆蓋了整個小鎮。

examples.english: You should change your unhealthy eating habits.
examples.chinese: 你應該改變你不健康的飲食習慣。

examples.english: Excuse me, I need some change for the bus.
examples.chinese: 不好意思，我需要一些零錢搭公車。

examples.english: For a change, let's go somewhere new this weekend.
examples.chinese: 這次換個口味，我們這週末去個新地方吧。

examples.english: I finally found my lost wallet under the bed.
examples.chinese: 我終於在床底下找到我遺失的錢包了。

examples.english: We must find a way to finish this project on time.
examples.chinese: 我們必須找到辦法準時完成這個專案。

examples.english: Many students find it hard to understand math problems.
examples.chinese: 許多學生覺得數學問題很難理解。

examples.english: I always lose my phone, so I need to be more careful.
examples.chinese: 我總是弄丟我的手機，所以我需要更小心。

examples.english: Our basketball team was sad because they lost the final game.
examples.chinese: 我們的籃球隊很難過，因為他們輸掉了總決賽。

examples.english: Even when things are hard, we should never lose hope.
examples.chinese: 即使事情很困難，我們也絕不應該失去希望。

examples.english: You should stop eating too much sugar for your health.
examples.chinese: 為了健康，你應該停止吃太多糖。

examples.english: The car had to stop suddenly when the cat ran across the road.
examples.chinese: 當貓衝過馬路時，車子不得不突然停止。

examples.english: We must work together to stop air pollution in our city.
examples.chinese: 我們必須共同努力來停止城市裡的空氣污染。

examples.english: We hope to arrive at the beach before noon.
examples.chinese: 我們希望在中午前到達海灘。

examples.english: Summer always arrives with warm weather and long days.
examples.chinese: 夏天總是帶著溫暖的天氣和漫長的日子到來。

examples.english: Help will arrive soon, so please don't worry.
examples.chinese: 救援很快就會到達，所以請別擔心。

examples.english: Don't forget to bring your lunch box to school tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 別忘了明天帶你的便當到學校。

examples.english: Studying hard will bring you good grades and more opportunities.
examples.chinese: 努力讀書將會為你帶來好成績和更多機會。

examples.english: My mother often asks me to bring her a cup of hot tea.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽常常叫我幫她倒一杯熱茶。

examples.english: It's easy to spend a lot of money when shopping online.
examples.chinese: 在網路購物時，很容易花掉很多錢。

examples.english: Don't spend too much time just playing on your phone.
examples.chinese: 不要花太多時間只顧著玩手機。

examples.english: They spent the entire summer learning to play the guitar.
examples.chinese: 他們把整個暑假都花在學吉他上。

examples.english: You should pay your phone bill before the due date.
examples.chinese: 你應該在截止日期前繳交你的電話費。

examples.english: Please pay attention to the teacher's instructions in class.
examples.chinese: 請在課堂上專心聽老師的指示。

examples.english: If you cheat on the test, you will pay the price.
examples.chinese: 如果你考試作弊，你將會付出代價。

examples.english: The little bird flew up into the tall tree.
examples.chinese: 小鳥飛進了高高的樹上。

examples.english: Please turn the music up; I can't hear it well.
examples.chinese: 請把音樂開大聲一點，我聽不太清楚。

examples.english: Are you up yet? We need to leave soon.
examples.chinese: 你起床了嗎？我們需要很快就離開。

examples.english: I totally agree with your idea to protect the environment.
examples.chinese: 我完全同意你保護環境的提議。

examples.english: After discussion, everyone agreed to finish the project by Friday.
examples.chinese: 討論後，大家都同意在週五前完成這個專案。

examples.english: The teachers and students agree that honesty is important.
examples.chinese: 老師和學生都同意誠實很重要。

examples.english: Please put your garbage in the trash can after eating.
examples.chinese: 吃完飯後請把垃圾丟進垃圾桶裡。

examples.english: That TV show was complete garbage; I turned it off quickly.
examples.chinese: 那個電視節目爛透了，我很快就把它關掉了。

examples.english: Don't forget to take out the garbage before the truck arrives.
examples.chinese: 別忘了在垃圾車來之前倒垃圾。

examples.english: Don't forget to lock the door before you leave.
examples.chinese: 你離開前別忘記鎖門。

examples.english: Forget it, we can try again next time.
examples.chinese: 算了，我們下次可以再試一次。

examples.english: She was so sad that she couldn't forget the bad news.
examples.chinese: 她太難過了，無法忘記那個壞消息。

examples.english: Can you hear the rain falling on the roof?
examples.chinese: 你有聽到雨落在屋頂上的聲音嗎？

examples.english: I just heard that our class trip is next month.
examples.chinese: 我剛聽說我們的班級旅行在下個月。

examples.english: I haven't heard from my old friend in a long time.
examples.chinese: 我很久沒有收到我老朋友的消息了。

examples.english: Can I have another cookie, please?
examples.chinese: 我可以再吃一塊餅乾嗎？

examples.english: This shirt is too small; I need another one.
examples.chinese: 這件襯衫太小了；我需要另一件。

examples.english: We have to wait for another ten minutes.
examples.chinese: 我們必須再等十分鐘。

examples.english: The spaghetti my sister cooked for dinner was really delicious.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐煮的晚餐義大利麵真是美味。

examples.english: After hiking, the ice cream tasted especially delicious.
examples.chinese: 健行後，冰淇淋嚐起來特別美味。

examples.english: Everyone agreed that the chef's special dish was incredibly delicious.
examples.chinese: 大家一致認為主廚的招牌菜美味極了。

examples.english: This chocolate cake is so yummy; I wish I could have another piece.
examples.chinese: 這巧克力蛋糕好好吃，我真希望可以再吃一塊。

examples.english: I can't wait to try this yummy-looking dessert after dinner.
examples.chinese: 我迫不及待想在晚餐後嚐嚐這道看起來好好吃的甜點。

examples.english: My sister thinks the mango pudding is the yummiest dessert ever.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹覺得芒果布丁是她吃過最好吃的甜點。

examples.english: It is difficult to solve this math problem without help.
examples.chinese: 沒人幫忙要解開這道數學題很困難。

examples.english: Understanding complex physics concepts can be very difficult for students.
examples.chinese: 理解複雜的物理概念對學生來說可能非常困難。

examples.english: We went through a difficult time during the pandemic lockdown.
examples.chinese: 在疫情封鎖期間，我們經歷了一段困難的時期。

examples.english: I often use my backpack as a pillow when traveling.
examples.chinese: 我旅行時常用我的背包當作枕頭。

examples.english: Please follow the instructions exactly as shown on the paper.
examples.chinese: 請完全依照紙上所示的說明去做。

examples.english: As we all know, exercising regularly is good for health.
examples.chinese: 正如我們所知，規律運動對健康有益。

examples.english: She likes to read books in her own quiet room.
examples.chinese: 她喜歡在自己安靜的房間裡看書。

examples.english: My family owns a small coffee shop in Taipei.
examples.chinese: 我的家人在台北擁有一間小咖啡店。

examples.english: He learned to play guitar completely on his own.
examples.chinese: 他完全靠自己學會了彈吉他。

examples.english: Is it true that our class will go on a field trip next month?
examples.chinese: 我們班下個月要去校外教學，這是真的嗎？

examples.english: A true friend helps you when you are in trouble.
examples.chinese: 一個真心的朋友會在你有困難時幫助你。

examples.english: You must be true to yourself and follow your heart.
examples.chinese: 你必須忠於自己並追隨你的心。

examples.english: Many tourists enjoy swimming in the beautiful blue sea during summer.
examples.chinese: 許多遊客喜歡在夏天時到美麗的藍色大海裡游泳。

examples.english: When the concert ended, a sea of people rushed out the door.
examples.chinese: 當演唱會結束時，一大群人湧出門外。

examples.english: After failing the exam, he was completely at sea about his future.
examples.chinese: 考試不及格後，他對自己的未來感到完全茫然。

examples.english: Visitors are always welcome to explore our beautiful city.
examples.chinese: 遊客總是歡迎來探索我們美麗的城市。

examples.english: When someone says 'thank you,' you can reply, 'You're welcome.'
examples.chinese: 當有人說「謝謝你」時，你可以回覆「不客氣」。

examples.english: After studying hard, a break is always welcome.
examples.chinese: 努力讀書後，休息總是令人愉快的。

examples.english: My parents are proud of my good grades in school.
examples.chinese: 我的父母為我在學校的好成績感到驕傲。

examples.english: We should always be proud to be Taiwanese people.
examples.chinese: 我們應該永遠為自己是台灣人而感到驕傲。

examples.english: Don't be too proud after you succeed; always stay humble.
examples.chinese: 成功後不要過於驕傲；要永遠保持謙虛。

examples.english: How far away is the nearest train station?
examples.chinese: 最近的火車站離這裡多遠？

examples.english: Please keep the sharp knives away from children.
examples.chinese: 請把鋒利的刀具遠離孩童。

examples.english: The library is only a ten-minute walk away from school.
examples.chinese: 圖書館離學校走路只要十分鐘。
